feed.title: SolidInvoice Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix installation process by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1658
  • Set default release version by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1657
  • Don't override config directory if it is already set by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1660
  • Remove Select2 and replace it with tom-select by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1661
  • Fix email templates by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1662
  • Use invoice/quote id when generating pdf files by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1663

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.3...2.3.4

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix DB password resets during installation process by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1666
  • Update mutable dates to immutable by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1667
  • Simplify adding users to quotes and invoices by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1668
  • Fix saving lines with decimal quantity by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1670
  • fix billing controller to lookup by uuid by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1671
  • Improve workflow buttons by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1672

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.4...2.3.5

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix password reset process by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1720
  • Bump symfony/ux-twig-component from 2.24.0 to 2.25.1 by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1734
  • Remove gmp extension by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1737
  • Add SaaSBundle by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1739
  • Allow user invites with env mailer config by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1742

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.5...2.3.6

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix setting mailer sender from config by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1758
  • Set logo size by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1787
  • Simplify registration process by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1786
  • Update FormHandlerBundle for PHP 8.4 compatibility by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1760

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.6...2.3.7

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix performance issues when loading api tokens by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1812

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.7...2.3.8
